channel.title: A Random Walk
channel.description: Recent content on A Random Walk

item.title: About
item.description: About This blog is about: the delights and frustrations of programming new things I learn/stumble across while coding interesting concepts/resources I come across trying to explain a few topics About Site This website is powered by Github pages and hugo and uses the beautifulhugo theme. About Me I am a software developer (mostly backend). I blog occasionally here or crosspost to dev.to. You can reach out to me via various websites in the footer.
